overallSummary: Fabio Giglietto maintains an active presence across multiple social media platforms, including Mastodon, LinkedIn, and Bluesky. With a collective follower base of 3580, he engages audiences primarily through content related to social media research and computational methods. LinkedIn appears to be the platform where he garners the most engagement, particularly for professional announcements.

contentThemes.description: Posts discussing research on social media platforms, including studies on coordinated behavior and disinformation.
Announcements about hiring and research opportunities, targeting professionals and students in related fields.
Sharing of newly published papers and participation in academic conferences.

recommendations: Increase frequency of posts on the most engaging platform (LinkedIn) to leverage professional network engagement.
Incorporate multimedia elements such as infographics or short videos to enhance content visibility and engagement.

platformInsights.mastodon: Engagement on Mastodon is moderate, with a focus on discussions about methodological approaches related to disinformation.
platformInsights.linkedin: LinkedIn is the most engaging platform, with high interaction rates, particularly for grant announcements and hiring opportunities.

topPerformingContent.content: Excited to announce that our research team has been awarded a new grant to study information operations across social media platforms.
Just published our new paper on coordinated inauthentic behavior on social media platforms!
